Recollections of Verdi
Springfield Park, Wigan (existed 1897-1999) 1st annual contest promoted by Springfield Park Recreation Club. Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £10, 3rd £6, 4th £4. March contest - 1st Sutton Manor.
